category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 13-3 (Organization and operation of member city/provincial sports associations)
contents: Article 13-3 (Organization and operation of member city/provincial sports associations) ① In order to ensure transparent operation of member city/provincial sports associations, the Sports Association shall guarantee the autonomous operation of member city/provincial sports associations, except as provided in the Articles of Incorporation and related regulations. . Newly established on July 5, 2021, ② The member city/provincial sports association is organized into the city/provincial sports association and the city/county/district sports association that the member city/provincial sports association has approved for membership. Revised July 5, 2021, ③ The president of the member city/provincial sports association shall be elected through an election in accordance with the articles of incorporation of the relevant organization. Revised March 16, 2021, July 5, 2021, ④ The organization and operation of member city/provincial sports associations, city/provincial sports organizations, and city/county/district sports associations shall be determined separately. Revised 2021. 7. 5.
